```
## Q1 Sisense Internal KT (Installation, Upgrade and Monitoring)

### Description

A knowledge transfer session is to be created for the Sisense installation, upgrade and monitoring processes. 

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] The process for installing Sisense is covered in the session
- [ ] The process for upgrading Sisense is covered in the session
- [ ] The process for monitoring Sisense is covered in the session 
- [ ] Any relevant best practices or considerations for these processes are included in the session
```
